name: Ralltiir Operations / In The Hands Of The Empire
ObjectiveText1: Deploy Ralltiir system. {While} this side up, once during each of your deploy phases, may deploy from Reserve Deck to Ralltiir one site or non-unique Imperial; reshuffle. At Ralltiir locations, each Rebel is deploy +2. {Flip} this card if Imperials control at least three Ralltiir sites and opponent controls no Ralltiir locations. {Place} out of play if Ralltiir is 'blown away.'
ObjectiveText2: {While} this side up, opponent's Force drains are -1. At Ralltiir locations, each Rebel is deploy +2. At all locations, add X to your total battle destiny, where X = number of Ralltiir locations your Imperials occupy. Once during each of your control phases, you may use 2 Force to take any one card into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. {Flip} this card if opponent controls at least two Ralltiir locations. {Place} out of play if Ralltiir is 'blown away.
ObjectiveBackName: In The Hands Of The Empire
